messages.content: Comfyui-MusePose is an image-to-video generation framework developed for virtual human under control signal such as pose.
Comfyui-MusePose falls under the Muse opensource series along with MuseV and MuseTalk.
Comfyui-MusePose is compatible with Linux and non-admin accounts on Windows.
It can be downloaded from the repository and installed using the specified pip commands.
The steps involve cloning the repository, navigating to the custom_nodes directory, installing the Python dependencies, and then started ComfyUI.
What recent version of diffusers is supported?
How are the required weights to be downloaded and organized?
Weights can be downloaded from Hugging Face and placed into the `pretrained_weights` directory, under specific paths for each component.
